entry.title: $2000 // BEST DEAL ONE BEDROOM IN UES
entry.content:
AMAZING DEAL LARGE 1 BR IN PRIME UES LOCATION

The unit features tons of natural light, hardwood floors, exposed brick throughout, recently renovated, high ceilings and queen size bedroom with abundant storage space.

entry.title: $2495 // *No Fee* Love Where You Live. Walk to Work Area!
entry.content:
By Owner No Fee

Located in the east 60's in the Upper East Side. Conveniently steps away from train links, shopping, caf√©s, restaurants, gyms, and more!

This cozy 1-bedroom has gorgeous hardwood floors, marble finishes in the bathroom, granite countertops and stainless steel appliances in the kitchen. The unit has a large living space and bedroom, plenty of windows for sunshine and natural lighting, ample closet space, and high ceilings. With enough space for a queen bed, couches, coffee and kitchen table, you will truly love where you live. Pet friendly. Hurry while it lasts, immediate move in!

The application process is easy.

For more information or for a quick showing, contact Thomas at show contact info
